name: Fish-Flavored Toast
effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s.
description: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.
source: Klee's specialty dish from cooking Fisherman's Toast.
